text:
(I hope, I choose right component)
<li>4.5: <fmt:formatNumber value="4.5" type="currency" pattern="#" /> (must be 
5)
<li>5.5: <fmt:formatNumber value="5.5" type="currency" pattern="#" />
<li>3.5: <fmt:formatNumber value="3.5" type="currency" pattern="#" />
<li>6.5: <fmt:formatNumber value="6.5" type="currency" pattern="#" /> (must be 
7)

produces 
4.5: 4 (must be 5)
5.5: 6
3.5: 4
6.5: 6 (must be 7)

Not a tomcat bug - its an issue with the JSTL tag implementation of fmt. But it 
appears - its a known issue.


http://robobruin.blogspot.com/2006/07/fmtformatnumber-rounding-behavior.html
